original_title: The Sum Total Of Our Memory: Facing Alzheimers Together
overview: An ode to memory: Couples affected by a partner's recent diagnosis of Early Alzheimer's come to terms with their changing roles. Prominent Alzheimer's medical experts offer their perspectives on diagnosis, the nature of the disease, helpful attitudes in caring for loved ones, stigma, support for caregivers, clinical trials, and overall healthcare concerns.
title: The Sum Total Of Our Memory: Facing Alzheimers Together
